name: anh hùng Rùa Xanh (itch)
description:
Giữ chuột trái và rê trái phải để chọn vòng chơi.

Nhấn chuột trái hoặc nút cách để nhảy. (Nhấn 2 lần để nhày cao) 

Hold the left mouse button and drag left or right to choose levels Left Mouse button or Spacebar to jump (Tap twice to double jump)

Green Turtle Hero (Anh Hung Rua Xanh) is a project designed to increase engagement with anti-littering working with Vietnam Clean & Green and RMIT University here in Vietnam. We will be using this  version to showcase and have fun with Vietnamese school kids in Saigon in 2019 as part of a wider educational campaign. Vietnamese language versions are available as free downloads on iOS and Androids. Search: Anh Hung Rua Xanh  

To read more about the project click here and here 

Please feel free to email me if you have any questions or would be interested in taking this project further: brian.mccauley@rmit.edu.vn   

Regards,

Brian McCauley
